sentences.english: Swan Lake might be a good choice.
sentences.chinese: 天鹅湖是个不错的选择。

sentences.english: Who wrote the ballet Swan Lake?
sentences.chinese: 芭蕾舞剧《天鹅湖》是谁写的？

sentences.english: The swan soon alighted upon a lake, where he swam and dove.
sentences.chinese: 下车后不久的天鹅湖，他在那里游泳和鸽子。

sentences.english: One of the most beloved ballets is “Swan Lake.”
sentences.chinese: 最为人们喜爱的芭蕾舞剧是“天鹅湖”。

sentences.english: The Sword-Shaped Rock Scenic Area consists of Goose Lake, Suspended Springs, Sword Rock, snow-covered Mountains and primeval forests.
sentences.chinese: 剑岩景区包括天鹅湖，悬瀑，剑岩，雪峰和原始森林。

sentences.english: "Swan Lake" is honored as one of the classic ballets.
sentences.chinese: 《天鹅湖》被奉为芭蕾舞剧的经典。

sentences.english: Kitty and Peter have decided to see Swan Lake'this saturday.
sentences.chinese: 这个星期六基蒂和彼得决定去看“天鹅湖”。

sentences.english: Swan Lake is her most frequently performed ballet.
sentences.chinese: 《天鹅湖》是她最常演的芭蕾舞剧目。

sentences.english: Swan Lake' is one of Tchaikovsky's best-known compositions.
sentences.chinese: 《天鹅湖》是柴可夫斯基最著名的作品之一。

sentences.english: It is also home to the famous Swan Lake.
sentences.chinese: 它更是著名的天鹅湖的故乡。

definition: Wild Swans, family autobiography by British-Chinese writer Jung Chang 張戎|张戎[Zhang1 Rong2]/alternative title 鴻|鸿, after the author's original name 張二鴻|张二鸿[Zhang1 Er4 hong2]
(bird species of China) whooper swan (Cygnus cygnus)
